ygData.subject: Re: Fishbone Earrings
ygData.msgSnippet: They are on a barbarian in Queynos hills he spawns at the little pond close to surefall galde. His name is Hadden. He spawns only once every 6 to 8 hours and
ygData.messageBody:
They are on a barbarian in Queynos hills he spawns at the little pond close
to surefall galde. His name is Hadden. He spawns only once every 6 to 8
hours and even then rarely has the earing. There are two other NPC's there
that will attack you one is a named human I don't know if he is monk or
warrior, the other is a named enchanter and he will charm you. Do not run to
Surefall to zone if they are chasing ye the guards at surefall will help
them not you. Also killing hadden will screw your faction with all barab's
and with the city of Halas.

Quindinar
----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Harrell <jharrell@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 7:21 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Fishbone Earrings


> From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>
>
> Yes, they're on a named barb NPC in Qeynos Hills.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: karnax@... [mailto:karnax@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 6:12 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] Fishbone Earrings
>
>
> From: karnax@...
>
> Does anyone know where the Fishbone earrings can be found, and what you
have
> to do in order to get them? Is it a quest item, or do you just have to
kill
> somebody?
>
